Community & Contact
===================

The MOAI software is kept in a subversion repository at:

https://svn.infrae.com/MOAI

Any questions regarding MOAI, bug reports or feature requests can be asked on the MOAI mailing list.

You can subscribe to the mailing list at:

http://lists.infrae.com/mailman/listinfo/moai-dev

Please drop us a line if you're using MOAI or pyoai, we would love to know.
Feedback is always appreciated!

If you are interested in support contracts or development projects 
regarding MOAI, please contact the author at jasper@infrae.com::

  Infrae
  Hoevestraat 10
  3033 GC  Rotterdam
  The Netherlands 

  +31 10 243 7051
